A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a 3.5 now. I think/hope\, once the final installment comes out in a couple years\, my opinion will change to 4-4.5. Heavy story line. A bit lighter on the action. Some of the attempts at comedy tried too hard. Ultimately\, special effects are amazing. Story line seems to be a great setup for next/final installment of the original story line. Lastly\, this was not about blowing up the Death Star (or some variation of that).
